title: Tour de France Stage 3: Girmay Blows Away the Favorites in Mass Sprint, Cavendish Out Of the Wheels
content:
Eritrean star scores whopper win in Turin, Cavendish doesn't hit top-20 in crash-marred finale.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 3: Girmay Blows Away the Favorites in Mass Sprint, Cavendish Out Of the Wheels on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
